name: @proton/styles
description: Proton Design system, for all Proton Projects: https://design-system.protontech.ch/
author: Proton AG

scripts.build:reset: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scss/specifics/android-v6-reset.scss assets/css/android-v6-reset.css; sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scss/specifics/android-v6-dark-mode.scss assets/css/android-v6-dark-mode.css; sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scss/specifics/android-ios-et-reset.scss assets/css/android-ios-et-reset.css
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:scss && yarn run lint:svg
